name: Flame Slash
description: Slashes enemy with a fiery blade, dealing fire damage and applying a burn effect.

effects.description: Deals 250% ATK as fire damage
Burns target for 50% ATK per turn for 2 turns

name: Blazing Shield
description: Creates a shield of flames that absorbs damage and burns attackers.

effects.description: Shields self for 300% DEF for 2 turns
Burns attackers for 80% ATK when shield is hit

name: Frost Nova
description: Releases a burst of freezing energy that damages and slows all enemies.

effects.description: Deals 180% ATK as ice damage to all enemies
Reduces enemy speed by 30% for 2 turns

name: Ice Prison
description: Encases target in ice, stunning them and reducing their defense.

effects.description: Stuns target for 1 turn
Reduces target defense by 40% for 3 turns

name: Lightning Strike
description: Calls down a powerful lightning bolt on a single enemy.

effects.description: Deals 350% ATK as lightning damage
20% chance to paralyze for 1 turn

name: Storm Rush
description: Charges at enemy with lightning speed, dealing massive damage.

effects.description: Deals 600% ATK as lightning damage
Increases own speed by 50% for 2 turns

name: Toxic Cloud
description: Spreads a poisonous cloud that damages all enemies over time.

effects.description: Poisons all enemies for 100% ATK per turn for 3 turns
Reduces healing received by 20% for 3 turns

name: Venom Fang
description: Bites target with venomous fangs, applying stacking poison.

effects.description: Deals 150% ATK as poison damage
Applies stacking poison (80% ATK per turn, stacks up to 3 times)

name: Healing Wave
description: Sends out a wave of healing energy that restores HP to all allies.

effects.description: Heals all allies for 200% ATK

name: Water Shield
description: Surrounds an ally with a protective water barrier.

effects.description: Shields target ally for 250% DEF for 3 turns
Increases target defense by 15% for 3 turns

name: Divine Blessing
description: Channels holy light to heal and buff all allies.

effects.description: Heals all allies for 150% ATK
Increases all allies' attack by 25% for 3 turns

name: Radiant Smite
description: Strikes with holy power, dealing extra damage to dark enemies.

effects.description: Deals 280% ATK as holy damage (double damage to dark element)
Reduces target attack by 30% for 2 turns

name: Shadow Strike
description: Strikes from shadows with lethal precision, ignoring part of defense.

effects.description: Deals 320% ATK as dark damage, ignoring 30% of target defense

name: Soul Reap
description: Harvests enemy souls, dealing massive damage to low HP targets.

effects.description: Deals 500% ATK as dark damage (double damage if target below 30% HP)
Heals self for 50% of damage dealt

name: Stone Skin
description: Hardens skin to absorb massive amounts of damage.

effects.description: Permanently increases defense by 50%
20% chance to ignore damage completely

name: Earthquake
description: Shakes the ground, damaging and stunning all enemies.

effects.description: Deals 220% ATK as physical damage to all enemies
60% chance to stun all enemies for 1 turn

name: Wind Boost
description: Channels wind to increase all allies' speed.

effects.description: Increases all allies' speed by 40% for 3 turns
Increases evasion by 20% for 3 turns

name: Aerial Grace
description: Passive agility that increases dodge chance.

effects.description: Permanently increases evasion by 25%
Increases speed by 15%

name: Dragon Breath
description: Breathes devastating flames that engulf all enemies.

effects.description: Deals 380% ATK as fire damage to all enemies
Burns all enemies for 120% ATK per turn for 3 turns

name: Dragon Scales
description: Passive armored scales that reduce incoming damage.

effects.description: Permanently reduces damage taken by 30%
25% chance to reflect 50% of damage back to attacker

name: Serpent Bite
description: Quick venomous bite that applies poison.

effects.description: Deals 120% ATK as poison damage
Poisons target for 60% ATK per turn for 3 turns

name: Crystal Restore
description: Channels crystal energy to heal and cleanse an ally.

effects.description: Heals target ally for 220% ATK
Removes all debuffs from target

name: Holy Arrow
description: Fires an arrow infused with divine light.

effects.description: Deals 280% ATK as holy damage
Deals additional 150% true damage to dark enemies

name: Arrow Rain
description: Rains down holy arrows on all enemies.

effects.description: Deals 240% ATK as holy damage to all enemies
Reduces all enemies' defense by 30% for 2 turns

name: Nightmare Blade
description: Strikes with fear-inducing blade, reducing enemy accuracy.

effects.description: Deals 300% ATK as dark damage
Reduces target accuracy by 40% for 2 turns

name: Root Bind
description: Summons roots to bind and damage enemies over time.

effects.description: 80% chance to immobilize target for 2 turns
Deals 90% ATK damage per turn while bound

name: Thunder Storm
description: Summons a storm that strikes all enemies with lightning.

effects.description: Deals 280% ATK as lightning damage to all enemies
Reduces all enemies' accuracy by 35% for 2 turns

name: Static Field
description: Creates an electric field that slows and damages enemies.

effects.description: Deals 150% ATK as lightning damage to all enemies
Reduces all enemies' speed by 25% for 3 turns

name: Berserker Rage
description: Enters berserk state, gaining power as HP decreases.

effects.description: Increases attack by up to 100% based on missing HP
Increases crit rate by 30%

name: Infernal Strike
description: Unleashes all accumulated rage in one devastating strike.

effects.description: Deals 450% ATK as fire damage (increased by Berserker Rage bonus)
Burns target for 150% ATK per turn for 2 turns
